APS Token Structure

Header

  • ‚Ä¢ Algorithm (alg)
  • ‚Ä¢ Key ID (kid)
  • ‚Ä¢ Token type (typ)

Payload

  • ‚Ä¢ User ID (userid)
  • ‚Ä¢ Client ID (client_id)
  • ‚Ä¢ Scopes (scope)
  • ‚Ä¢ Expiration (exp)

Signature

  • ‚Ä¢ RSA256 signature
  • ‚Ä¢ Validates authenticity
  • ‚Ä¢ Cannot be verified client-side
